about_the_game:
Grog is a First-Person online party game where 2-8 players compete in many Australian-dad-inspired minigames to see who is truly the greatest Aussie dad.

Minigames

Compete in various minigames against your friends to earn points. Whoever has the most points after all minigames are complete, wins! Here are some of the challenges you will compete in:


BBQ off
Cook as much meat as possible within the time limit. Make sure you don't burn the meat though!

Lawnmowing
Mow a lawn... More than the others

Beer Collecting
You are in desperate need of some beer. Run around and collect any beer you can find before the other Dads find it!

Camping
Collect important materials located around the map and improve your campsite before it's too dark!

Surfing
Look back to your glory days and bring back your exceptional surfing skills. Use these old-school skills to stay in the water and avoid waves for as long as possible!

Line Waiting
You've been dragged to go shopping with your wife, and now you're waiting in line at the checkout. However, there are still so many cool dad things located around the store, so you'll have to sneak out of line and collect them without your wife knowing!

Home Improvements
Your home is in desperate need of some new improvements, so you're going to build a deck. Scavage through the hardware store and find the items you need to craft the perfect deck for your house.

Parkour
You've just finished camping out in the middle of nowhere, but now you need to make it back home. Parkour your way through the wilderness, hopping over rivers, and weaving through trees to make it back to your beloved home!

Powerups
You need some essential upgrades to help you compete against the other dads, so you go shopping. Use your time and points wisely to select the powerups that will give you the greatest advantage in your next minigames.

Character Customisation

Make your dad look stylish! Create your unique look by customising the colours of your shirt, shoes, skin, shorts, or beard! Also earn shoes, hats, and body accessories while playing Grog to improve your style. If you're lucky, you may even get items that are painted, glowing, or have a special effect!

Secrets...

Keep a lookout for the legendary Aussie beer bottles. Can you find them all?

Why?

Well, you see, Darren here is sick and tired of the lack of Australian-dad representation in video games! So, he assigned me the task of creating the greatest Aussie video game, one where he can finally prove that he, and maybe you, are the greatest dads of all time.

- School photo of Darren from 1975

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Grog

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: i5-6600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 425M or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Grog is a First-Person, 2-8 player online multiplayer party game where you compete against your friends in various Australian-inspired minigames to see who the greatest Aussie dad is.
